text: @narendramodi Hello sir mein ek suggestions dena chahta hu ki covid19 mein jobhi case possitiv he unsabko 15th floor ya usse bhi uper leja ke dekho ki kya covid 19 ka power down huaa ki nahi its not a joke plz take seriously and take one chance,jay hind
